metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3857 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in libpng 1.6.38. A crafted PNG image can lead to asegmentation fault and denial of service in png_setup_paeth_row() function.

criterions.comment: libpng: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libpng1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
